wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Ahin fili n yiko kadasi n bu  [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|yi fiteewa n bo bu sunu ]] [[creativecommons:by-sa/3.0/deed.en|Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported]] yiko kadasi .
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: N a sɔn su, kpakpaki juma n nu na a sandii
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Wɔ yo daka ka  afa kansi fa ma,na a kere Atin bo afa su nya yiko kadasi ni,na a kere nzen a yo  kaakiwam.Akoro yo bo i  tɔɔ su,ama mà a yo bo i kɔ kere ka yiko kadasi ma fɔ na asoro su wara u kukere n nu.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Nzɛn asasaŋgaari,kaakiri wo, wara  ata bukaari niŋge n su , wɔ yo daka ka akpakpaki u alecira bukasum fa se [[ccorg:share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses|deke kun  wara dansɛ kadasi kun]] ka kpa ni.
